feature_model.name: Mobile Tourist Planner

meta.data: Simplified mobile tourist planner feature model. It manages information about the weather

feature_model.feature_tree: :r MobileTouristPlanner(_r) :m Weather(_r_1) :g (_r_1_5) [1,1] : Global_Weather(_r_1_5_6) : Weather_Forecast(_r_1_5_7) :m Location(_r_2) :m Transportation(_r_3) :g (_r_3_8) [1,*] : Bicycle(_r_3_8_9) : Bus(_r_3_8_10) : Train(_r_3_8_11) :o Biling(_r_4)
